headline.main: U.S. MAY SEIZE 11 FRENCH VESSELS; Ready to Act if Vichy Aids Germany by Placing Navy at Her Disposal

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Nov. 26 -- Admiral Emory S. Land, chairman of the Maritime Commission, has discussed with President Roosevelt and State Department officials preparations for immediate requisitioning and putting into war service all eleven French merchant ships in American ports if closer collaboration between Vichy and Berlin makes the services of the French fleet available to Germany.
abstract: Conf with officials on French ships seizure
